scripts.test: /Applications/XAMPP/bin/mysql -u root --password='' -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS domotik;' && /Applications/XAMPP/bin/mysql -u root --password='' -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS domotik;' && /Applications/XAMPP/bin/mysql -u root --password='' domotik < ./domotik.sql && mocha --exit && /Applications/XAMPP/bin/mysql -u root --password='' domotik < ./domotik.sql
